au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: POL_SF_ON_L1=6m_L2=5p5m
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript:
from time import sleep
driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(4700,0) # Drive guide to g6 config driveGuide(guideConfig.p6) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for p6) driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # Drive flipper driveFlipper(1) time.sleep(60)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(29, 200) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(210)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(29, 0) driveBsz(251.5)
